abilities.name: To the Last
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength.

abilities.name: Oath of Rynn
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of either player’s Command phase, this model can use this ability. When it does, until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit.

abilities.name: Inspiring Commander
abilities.rule: If you include this model in your army, until the end of the battle, non-**CHARACTER** models in **STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD** units from your army have an Objective Control characteristic of 2 while they are not Battle-shocked.
